lines.text: You know I like to help you with your work.
Oh, but you do. Any suggestions?
Well, in this week's for instance, Miss Robin Hood says "Golly, here's the police"
Yes, she seems to say that every week, doesn't she?
Well, that part's all right. It's just that well, we don't say "golly" any more.
Well, not really I suppose... Babs Henshawe says "golly", and she's hockey captain
That would seem to justify it, wouldn't it?
